1.name: Top Gun
1.description: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

2.name: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
2.description: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

3.name: Stand by Me
3.description: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a boyhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

4.name: Platoon
4.description: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

5.name: Aliens
5.description: Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team after being in hypersleep for 57 years. The moon that the Nostromo visited has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

6.name: Labyrinth
6.description: A 16-year-old girl is given 13 hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King.

7.name: Blue Velvet
7.description: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

8.name: One Crazy Summer
8.description: An aspiring teenage cartoonist and his friends come to the aid of a singer trying to save her family property from developers.

9.name: Highlander
9.description: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

10.name: Big Trouble in Little China
10.description: A rough-and-tumble trucker helps rescue his friend's fiance from an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.

11.name: Pretty in Pink
11.description: A poor girl must choose between the affections of dating her childhood sweetheart or a rich but sensitive playboy.

12.name: The Fly
12.description: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

13.name: Nine 1/2 Weeks
13.description: A woman gets involved in an impersonal affair with a man. She barely knows about his life, only about the sex games they play, so the relationship begins to get complicated.

14.name: The Wraith
14.description: After a young man is murdered by a road-racing gang of motor-heads, a mysterious fast-driving spirit descends from the sky to take revenge.

15.name: Manhunter
15.description: Former F.B.I. profiler Will Graham (William Petersen) returns to service to pursue a deranged serial killer named "the Tooth Fairy" (Tom Noonan) by the media.

16.name: Cobra
16.description: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far reaching plans.

17.name: Little Shop of Horrors
17.description: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

18.name: The Money Pit
18.description: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

19.name: Flight of the Navigator
19.description: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

20.name: Lucas
20.description: A socially inept fourteen year old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends -- Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love -- fall for each other.

21.name: Maximum Overdrive
21.description: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

22.name: River's Edge
22.description: This is actually based on a true story that took place in Milpitas, CA in the mid 80's.

23.name: Crocodile Dundee
23.description: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

24.name: Back to School
24.description: To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.

25.name: Short Circuit
25.description: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

26.name: Howard the Duck
26.description: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop a hellish alien invasion with the help of a nerdy scientist and a cute struggling female rock singer who fancies him.

27.name: Der Name der Rose
27.description: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

28.name: From Beyond
28.description: A group of scientists have developed the Resonator, a machine which allows whoever is within range to see beyond normal perceptible reality. But when the experiment succeeds, they are immediately attacked by terrible life forms.

29.name: The Karate Kid Part II
29.description: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

30.name: Tenkû no shiro Rapyuta
30.description: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

31.name: Youngblood
31.description: A 17 year old farm boy is offered an ice hockey tryout. His brother drives him to Canada. He has fast legs, slow fists, but is chosen. Will he learn to use his fists and play ice hockey the Canuck way? Will he get the coach's cute daughter?

32.name: The Golden Child
32.description: A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child who dark forces want to eliminate.

33.name: Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives
33.description: Tommy Jarvis goes to the graveyard to get rid of Jason Voorhees' body once and for all, but inadvertently brings him back to life instead. The newly revived killer once again seeks revenge, and Tommy may be the only one who can defeat him.

34.name: ¡Three Amigos!
34.description: Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

35.name: Sid and Nancy
35.description: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

36.name: Peggy Sue Got Married
36.description: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

37.name: SpaceCamp
37.description: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

38.name: At Close Range
38.description: In 1978 Pennsylvania, an absentee father is reacquainted with his estranged teenage sons who become intrigued with his romanticized life of crime.

39.name: Legal Eagles
39.description: A New York district attorney works and flirts with his adversary and her kooky artist client, who is on trial for a murder she didn't commit.

40.name: Critters
40.description: A group of small, furry aliens makes lunch out of the locals in a farming town.

41.name: F/X
41.description: A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.

42.name: The Color of Money
42.description: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

43.name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
43.description: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

44.name: Nothing in Common
44.description: A highly successful advertising executive decides to put his job on hold after getting an update from his father that he and his wife are divorced and decides to extend his break after revealing that his father is a diabetic.

45.name: An American Tail
45.description: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

46.name: Hoosiers
46.description: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

47.name: The Hitcher
47.description: A young man who escapes the clutches of a murderous hitch-hiker is subsequently stalked by the hitcher and framed for his crimes.

48.name: Night of the Creeps
48.description: Alien brain parasites, entering humans through the mouth, turn their host into a killing zombie. Some teenagers start to fight against them.

49.name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2
49.description: A radio host is victimized by the cannibal family as a former Texas Marshall hunts them.

50.name: The Mission
50.description: Eighteenth century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.
